TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CriticalHandle extends System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.CriticalFinalizerObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class CriticalHandle Inherits CriticalFinalizerObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class CriticalHandle abstract : System::Runtime::ConstrainedExecution::CriticalFinalizerObject, IDisposable
type CriticalHandle = class inherit CriticalFinalizerObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 代表控制代碼資源的包裝函式類別。

span.span: Represents a wrapper class for handle resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是類似類別，不同之處在於實作參考計數。The class is similar to the class, except that implements reference counting. 您可以使用而不是位址效能考量，更提供必要的同步處理時，有效率地使用您自己。You can use instead of to address performance considerations when you can provide the necessary synchronization more efficiently yourself. 因為類別不會執行參考計數，但是它不提供從控制代碼回收安全性攻擊的保護。Because the class does not perform reference counting, it does not provide protection from handle recycling security attacks. 參考計數演算法會以隱含方式序列化作業，因為一定數量的執行緒安全性也會遺失。Because the reference counting algorithm implicitly serializes operations, a certain amount of thread safety is also lost. 如果您呼叫或是方法時使用控制代碼的作業未在另一個執行緒，或如果您呼叫或從在同一時間的兩個執行緒，則結果為不具決定性。If you call the or method while an operation that is using the handle is outstanding on another thread, or if you call or from two threads at the same time, the results are non-deterministic. 類別仍然會提供所提供的保證關鍵結束類別。The class still provides the guaranteed critical finalization provided by the class.

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個成員無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 標記要釋出和釋放資源的控制代碼。

span.span: Marks the handle for releasing and freeing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫或方法可讓要釋放的資源。Calling the or method allows the resources to be freed. 不同於類別，這一律會發生立即因為沒有任何參考計數，以指出其他執行緒正在使用此控制代碼。Unlike the class, this will always happen immediately since there is no reference count to indicate that other threads are using this handle. 因此，您必須採用同步處理機制，以確保它是安全地呼叫方法。Therefore, you must employ a synchronization mechanism to ensure it is safe to call the method. 雖然大部分的類別使用類別不需要提供完成項，這有時是必要 （例如，排清出檔案緩衝區，或撰寫一些資料放回記憶體）。Although most classes that use the class do not need to provide a finalizer, this is sometimes necessary (for example, to flush out file buffers or to write some data back into memory). 在此情況下，類別可以提供完成項保證會執行之前，關鍵完成項執行。In this case, the class can provide a finalizer that is guaranteed to run before the critical finalizer runs. 呼叫或是方法，當您完成使用物件。Call the or method when you are finished using the object. 方法會中無法使用的狀態物件。The method leaves the object in an unusable state. **附註**永遠為呼叫或是您釋放最後一個參考之前物件。**Note** Always call or before you release your last reference to the object. 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

summary.span: 標記要釋出和釋放資源的控制代碼。

span.span: Marks the handle for releasing and freeing resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫或方法可讓要釋放的資源。Calling the or method allows the resources to be freed. 不同於類別，這一律會發生立即因為沒有任何參考計數，以指出其他執行緒正在使用此控制代碼。Unlike the class, this will always happen immediately since there is no reference count to indicate that other threads are using this handle. 因此，您必須採用同步處理機制，以確保它是安全地呼叫方法。Therefore, you must employ a synchronization mechanism to ensure it is safe to call the method. 雖然大部分的類別使用類別不需要提供完成項，這有時是必要 （例如，排清出檔案緩衝區，或撰寫一些資料放回記憶體）。Although most classes that use the class do not need to provide a finalizer, this is sometimes necessary (for example, to flush out file buffers or to write some data back into memory). 在此情況下，類別可以提供完成項保證會執行之前，關鍵完成項執行。In this case, the class can provide a finalizer that is guaranteed to run before the critical finalizer runs. 呼叫或是方法，當您完成使用物件。Call the or method when you are finished using the object. 方法會中無法使用的狀態物件。The method leaves the object in an unusable state. **附註**永遠為呼叫或是方法之前您釋放最後一個參考物件。**Note** Always call the or method before you release your last reference to the object. 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

param.name: disposing

span.span: for a normal dispose operation; to finalize the handle.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，指定是否要執行一般處置作業。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class specifying whether to perform a normal dispose operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該永遠不會明確地呼叫方法`disposing`參數設為`false`。You should never explicitly call the method with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放與控制代碼相關的所有資源。

span.span: Frees all resources associated with the handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是解構函式類別。The method is the destructor for the class. 應用程式程式碼不應該直接呼叫這個方法。Application code should not call this method directly.

summary.span: 指定要包裝的控制代碼。

span.span: Specifies the handle to be wrapped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會公開控制代碼可公開 (也就是在衍生的類別之外)。Do not expose the handle publicly (that is, outside of the derived class).

summary.span: 取得值，指出控制代碼是否已關閉。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the handle is closed.

value.span: 如果控制代碼已關閉，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the handle is closed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回值，指出是否物件的控制代碼已不再與原生資源相關聯。The method returns a value indicating whether the object's handle is no longer associated with a native resource. 這不同於定義屬性，計算是否一律視為指定的控制代碼無效。This differs from the definition of the property, which computes whether a given handle is always considered invalid. 方法會傳回`true`值在下列情況：The method returns a `true` value in the following cases: - 呼叫方法。The method was called. - 方法或呼叫方法並沒有參考至其他執行緒上的物件。The method or method was called and there are no references to the object on other threads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsInvalid As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsInvalid { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值以指出這個控制代碼值是否無效。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the handle value is invalid.

value.span: 如果控制代碼有效，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the handle is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別必須實作屬性，以便決定是否需要重大的最終處理，通用語言執行平台。Derived classes must implement the property so that the common language runtime can determine whether critical finalization is required. 在衍生的類別必須提供符合其所支援的控制代碼的一般類型的實作 （0 或-1 無效）。Derived classes must provide an implementation that suits the general type of handle they support (0 or -1 is invalid). 這些類別可以再進一步衍生特定的安全控制代碼類型。These classes can then be further derived for specific safe handle types. 不同於屬性，報告是否物件已完成使用基礎控制代碼，屬性計算是否一律視為指定的控制代碼值無效。Unlike the property, which reports whether the object has finished using the underlying handle, the property calculates whether the given handle value is always considered invalid. 因此，屬性一律傳回相同的值，針對任何一個控制代碼值。Therefore, the property always returns the same value for any one handle value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ReleaseHandle() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ReleaseHandle () As Boolean

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，執行釋放控制代碼所需的程式碼。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, executes the code required to free the handle.

returns.span: 如果成功釋放控制代碼，則為 ；如果發生嚴重失敗的事件，則為 。

span.span: if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, in the event of a catastrophic failure, .

returns.span: 在這種情況下，它會產生 releaseHandleFailed Managed 偵錯助理。

span.span: In this case, it generates a releaseHandleFailed Managed Debugging Assistant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會保證會呼叫一次，前提是您採用適當的同步處理機制，以確保只有一個呼叫或方法。The method is guaranteed to be called only once, provided that you employ proper synchronization mechanisms to ensure that only one call to the or method is made. 將不會呼叫方法，如果或是屬性是`true`。The method will not be called if the or property is `true`. 實作這個方法，在您衍生的類別執行任何程式碼，才能釋放控制代碼。Implement this method in your derived classes to execute any code that is required to free the handle. 因為其中的函式是要保證的資源流失，您的實作中的程式碼防護必須永遠不會失敗。Because one of the functions of is to guarantee prevention of resource leaks, the code in your implementation of must never fail. 記憶體回收行程呼叫標準完成設定式已執行之物件的同時，回收，以及保證的資源，以叫用並，它不會中斷，而它正在進行中之後。The garbage collector calls after normal finalizers have been run for objects that were garbage collected at the same time, and guarantees the resources to invoke it and that it will not be interrupted while it is in progress. （以及其靜態 determinable 呼叫歷程圖中的所有方法） 的執行個體建構期間會限制的執行區域 (CER) 作為備妥此方法。This method will be prepared as a constrained execution region (CER) at instance construction time (along with all the methods in its statically determinable call graph). 雖然這會防止執行緒中止插斷，但您仍然必須小心，不要將介紹在您覆寫任何錯誤路徑方法。Although this prevents thread abort interrupts, you must still be careful not to introduce any fault paths in your overridden method. 特別是，套用屬性設定為您從呼叫任何方法。In particular, apply the attribute to any methods you call from . 在大部分情況下應使用此程式碼：In most cases this code should be: `ReliabilityContract(Consistency.WillNotCorruptState, Cer.Success)` 此外，對於簡單的清除作業 (例如，呼叫 Win32 API`CloseHandle`檔案控制代碼上) 的單一平台叫用呼叫，您可以檢查傳回的值。Additionally, for simple cleanup (for example, calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` on a file handle) you can check the return value for the single platform invoke call. 對於複雜的清除作業，您可能必須很多程式邏輯和許多的方法呼叫，其中有些可能會失敗。For complex cleanup, you may have a lot of program logic and many method calls, some of which might fail. 您必須確定您的程式邏輯，有這種情況下的每個後援的程式碼。You must ensure that your program logic has fallback code for each of those cases. 如果方法會傳回`false`基於任何原因，它會產生[releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) Managed 偵錯助理。If the method returns `false` for any reason, it generates a [releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) Managed Debugging Assistant.

related.span: 診斷 Managed 偵錯助理的執行階段錯誤

span.span: Diagnosing Run-time Errors with Managed Debugging Assistants
ReleaseHandleFailed

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetHandle(native int handle) cil managed

param.name: handle
param.span: 要使用的既有控制代碼。

span.span: The pre-existing handle to use.

summary.span: 將控制代碼設定為指定的既有控制代碼。

span.span: Sets the handle to the specified pre-existing handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，您需要支援既有控制代碼 （例如，如果在結構中，會傳回的控制代碼） 因為.NET Framework 的 COM interop 的基礎結構不支援封送處理時，才會處理結構中。Use the method only if you need to support a pre-existing handle (for example, if the handle is returned in a structure) because the .NET Framework COM interop infrastructure does not support marshaling handles in a structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetHandleAsInvalid() cil managed

summary.span: 將控制代碼標示為無效。

span.span: Marks a handle as invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫只有當您知道您的控制代碼無效，而且您想要做此標記的方法。Call the method only when you know that your handle is invalid and you want to mark it as such. 如此一來，不會變更的值欄位; 它只會將標示為無效的控制代碼。Doing so does not change the value of the field; it only marks the handle as invalid. 控制代碼，則可能包含過時的值。The handle might then contain a potentially stale value. 這個呼叫的效果是，不會嘗試釋放資源。The effect of this call is that no attempt is made to free the resources. 如同方法，請使用只有當您需要支援既有控制代碼。As with the method, use only if you need to support a pre-existing handle.
